person.persName: John B. Leatherman (Jefferson County, Kentucky, blacksmith.)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Kentucky, native. Married to Polly Barr Leatherman in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on February 10, 1822. Father of John Thomas Leatherman and Simeon S. Leatherman. Married to America Smith Leatherman in Jefferson County on August 17, 1837. Father of Zenobia Jane Leatherman Omer, Elizabeth Leatherman, Merritt O. Leatherman, Marietta R. Leatherman Randolph, and Mary B. Leatherman. Married to Mahala M. Brooks Lively Leatherman in Jefferson County on April 29, 1854. Blacksmith in Jefferson County in 1850. Blacksmith in Jefferson County in 1860.
